ingredients: 1 small red onion, halved and sliced into thin half-moons, 2 tablespoons lime juice, or more to taste, 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, 1  seedless watermelon, cut into cubes, 3  baby cucumbers, seeded and cut into cubes, 1 cup crumbled feta cheese,   +   1/2 cup mint leaves, sliced thinly
nutrition: Total Fat 7g 8%, Saturated Fat 3g 14%, Cholesterol 13mg 4%, Sodium 172mg 7%, Total Carbohydrate 36g 13%, Dietary Fiber 2g 7%, Total Sugars 29g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 39mg 194%, Calcium 110mg 8%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 529mg 11%
